import React from 'react' import { useContext} from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import NoteContext from '../Context/Notes/NoteContext'; const NotesItem = (props) => { const { deleteNote, editNote } = useContext(NoteContext) const { note } = props; console.log(note.title) const [enote, setEnote] = useState({id:'', title: '', description: '', tag: ''}) const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); note.title = enote.title; note.description = enote.description; note.tag = enote.tag; console.log(note.title) editNote(note._id, enote.title, enote.description, enote.tag); } const handleChange = (e)=>{ setEnote({...enote, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (
{note.title}
{ return deleteNote(note._id) }}>

{note.description}

Edit Note
) } export default NotesItem
